evidence.claim: HomeCare Therapeutics utilizes AWS for its cloud infrastructure.
The company implements FHIR standards for health data interoperability.
HomeCare Therapeutics leverages Kafka for managing real-time data streams.
The use of X12 transaction sets has been documented for billing and claims management.

icp.icp_reason: Engaged in health tech with strong EDI and X12 capabilities, indicating high API usage
matched_use_cases: Data exchange with providers and payers
